name:name: # ^ name: primary key using 'name' type (dotted identifier)
# ^ catalogId: 'long' type for 64-bit IDs (note extreme values to test range)
# ^ code: custom type 'itemCode' validated with pattern ^[A-Z][A-Z][A-Z]%-[0-9]+$
# ^ rarity: references the Rarity enum (defined in Rarity.tsv, registered via superType=enum)
# ^ price: custom type 'gold' (alias for uint, unsigned 32-bit integer)
# ^ element: union type Element|nil - optional; nil means the item has no elemental affinity
# ^ tags: array of strings {string} - values listed WITHOUT outer braces, strings quoted
# ^ devNotes: union comment|nil - optional strippable developer notes
